llm.feedback: The draft coherently links macro regime anchors to moat platforms but needs sharper causal logic, tighter alignment to the SECTION FOCUS, and explicit, data-grounded probabilities; to upgrade, (1) build a concise, testable causal map from each invariant driver (aging demographics/LTC cost, persistent inflation, software/cloud/healthcare moats, tariff/policy responses) to a single regime outcome with explicit thresholds (e.g., tariff pass-through or inflation prints crossing a defined band triggers a higher discount/required return) and pre‑specified check-points; (2) convert to exactly four Up/Down items in the required format, standardize horizons (e.g., 0–4 weeks, 0–3 months, 3–6 months) per line, and attach a concrete, source-grounded probability to each line derived from the evidence rather than heuristic defaults; (3) ground the base/alternative scenarios in first principles (discount-rate dynamics, moat re-rating mechanics, durability of cash flows) and lock in clearly defined catalysts (tariff/pricing signals, AI productivity milestones, debt dynamics) plus explicit invalidation rules; (4) replace broad claims with numbers from the sources (e.g., $3,800 per household impact from IGP1Q4ZEJ; UNH FCF yield >9%; MSFT/SHOP Azure momentum with 39% YoY AI/cloud growth; Azure contracted revenue ≈ $368B) and attribute each to the exact IDs; (5) enforce strict citation discipline so every factual assertion has a parenthetical ID, reconcile conflicts (e.g., tariff pass-through vs inflation paths) by stating the dominant read for base-case and the conditions under which alternate reads prevail; (6) scrub the prose for redundancy and ensure watchlists are actionably tied to each trigger with 2–4 week data points (e.g., Pacaso/mogul cadence, HeartSciences milestones, UAS capex signals) rather than scattered teases; and (7) validate the four lines’ probabilities with a transparent method (e.g., conditional on specific triggers, not fixed percentages) and provide a brief justification inline. If you implement these edits, ensure the four lines render as Up/Down | Time window | Driver/Mechanism | What to watch | Probability% with concrete, sourced triggers.
